alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 31 at 3:33AM MST until February 02 at 9:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches possible. Expect higher amounts in the San Juan Foothills. * WHERE...Animas River Basin. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
